snippet: Marilyn B. Tavenner, who was criticized for the troubled rollout of the HealthCare.Gov website, will succeed Karen M. Ignagni as the insurance industry’s top lobbyist.
abstract: Marilyn B Tavenner, former Obama administration official in charge of HealthCare.gov rollout, is appointed president and chief executive of trade group America’s Health Insurance Plans; move makes Tavenner top lobbyist for nation's health insurance industry.
lead_paragraph: Marilyn B. Tavenner, who was criticized for the troubled rollout of the HealthCare.Gov website, will succeed Karen M. Ignagni as the insurance industry’s top lobbyist.

headline.main: Head of Obama’s Health Care Rollout to Lobby for Insurers
headline.print_headline: Head of Obama’s Health Care Rollout to Lobby for Insurers

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
